sentence.Network_en: Do you sweat a lot or flush a lot?
sentence.Network_cn: 你常出汗或是脸上常发烫吗？

sentence.Network_en: This woman wore seamed nylons and kept smoothing her skirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个女士穿着长筒尼龙缝袜，不停地把裙子弄平整。

sentence.Network_en: If we're feeling flush we'll probably give them champagne.
sentence.Network_cn: 等我们有钱了就可能会给他们喝香槟。

auth_sentence.content: Can Foyle flush out those reds under the bed?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can Foyle flush out those reds under the bed?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can Foyle flush out those reds under the bed?

auth_sentence.content: Natural selection would most certainly flush out the rejects.
auth_sentence.res_content: Natural selection would most certainly flush out the rejects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Natural selection would most certainly flush out the rejects.

auth_sentence.content: Go home and flush your Elavil down the toilet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Go home and flush your Elavil down the toilet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Go home and flush your Elavil down the toilet.
